paper_abstract: A regularized second degree Newton method is proposed and implemented for the inverse problem for scattering of time-harmonic acoustic waves from a sound-soft obstacle. It combines ideas due to Johansson and Sleeman [18] and Hettlich and Rundell [8] and reconstructs the obstacle from the far field pattern for scattering of one incident plane wave. (C) 2011 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: A second degree Newton method for an inverse obstacle scattering problem
